title: Draw
text: Draw vectors representing the path taken, lining the vectors up from tip to tail.

title: Measure
text: Solve $$30cos\left(68\right)-27.5cos\left(66\right)$$ is the $$x$$ vector length for vector A and $$20cos\left(40\right)$$ is the $$x$$ vector length for vector B. Solve $$20sin\left(40\right)-12sin\left(70\right)$$ where $$12sin\left(70\right)$$ is the $$y$$ vector length for vector A and $$20sin\left(40\right)$$ is the $$y$$ vector length for vector B. Now use pythagorean theorem for the total length.
